pages.text: The vindicator is a brusque illager with a bad temper.$(br2)At ease, they amble around while grunting with their arms together; but when preparing to attack, they unlink their hands and brandish a fearsome looking $(thing)iron axe$().$(br2)Their swings pack a brutal punch; a shield won't help here as that axe simply
knocks it out of the way, preventing me from using it. If i'm not careful, they can cut me down in seconds.
